content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (61, -52)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (61.0, -52.0)) with fuel (coal: 7), processing copper-ore (8) to produce copper-plate (20).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and the necessary input materials before attempting to smelt. Check the inventory of both the furnace and the agent to confirm availability.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
